letters.description: Conduct a comprehensive initial assessment of physical, emotional, and mental well-being; identify current wellness practices and any limiting beliefs or fears surrounding pregnancy and birth.
Educate and guide clients on evidence-based prenatal nutrition, safe movement, quality sleep, and stress reduction techniques; foster informed decision-making for optimal health.
Cultivate a positive mindset, emotional resilience, and effective coping strategies; address anxieties, discomforts, and challenges through holistic and empowering approaches.
Develop a clear vision for a positive birth experience and a healthy postpartum recovery; set realistic expectations and proactive plans for the transition into motherhood.
Integrate sustainable wellness habits and self-advocacy skills for long-term well-being; empower the client to embrace their evolving identity as a mother with confidence and self-compassion.
